item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着对美国经济和大型科技公司的担忧加剧，全球股市的溃败也愈演愈烈。这使得周五的薪资数据受到比往常更多的关注。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. item.title: 投资银行受到无情重组浪潮的刺激
item.description: 华尔街长期以来一直在谈论交易反弹，但事实证明，对于精品顾问公司来说，破产和重组才是异常持久的 "摇钱树"。【原文：A dealmaking rebound has long been on Wall Street’s lips, but it’s bankruptcy and restructuring that’s proving to be an unusually persistent money-spinner for boutique advisers.】

item.title: 雪佛龙业绩未达预期，赫斯延期压力倍增
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）的利润未达预期，这给首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）带来了更大的压力，迫使他在以 530 亿美元收购赫斯公司（Hess Corp.【原文：Chevron Corp. missed profit estimates, heaping more pressure on Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth to prevail in his $53 billion effort to acquire Hess Corp.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总统阿比希望货币贬值至街头市场水平
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚总理阿比-艾哈迈德（Abiy Ahmed）斥责银行将该国货币汇率维持在比平行市场交易商提供的汇率强得多的水平。【原文：Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed berated banks for keeping the exchange rate of the nation’s currency at much stronger levels than what traders in the parallel market were offering.】

item.title: 中国拒绝国际货币基金组织提出的 1 万亿美元住房救助方案
item.description: 中国政府拒绝了国际货币基金组织提出的利用中央政府资金完成未完工住房的建议，而这正是阻碍中国经济扭转颓势的一个关键问题。【原文：Chinese authorities have rejected a proposal made by the International Monetary Fund to use central government funds to complete unfinished housing, a key problem preventing a turnaround of an industry that’s been a major drag on the economy.】

item.title: 美银美林的哈特内特称美联储首次降息时将抛售股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，当美联储首次降息时，股市很可能会下跌，因为降息的中枢将在数据发出美国经济硬着陆而非软着陆信号时出现。【原文：Stocks are likely to fall when the Federal Reserve delivers its first interest-rate cut because the pivot will come as data signal a hard — rather than soft — landing for the US economy, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 越南派遣海岸警卫队舰艇前往菲律宾进行联合训练
item.description: 越南表示已向菲律宾派出一个海岸警卫队代表团，参加这两个东南亚国家之间的联合训练。【原文：Vietnam said it has sent a coast guard delegation to the Philippines for joint training between the two Southeast Asian nations.】

item.title: Orlen 在 2.9 亿美元的 EDPR 交易中将绿色产能提高 30
item.description: 波兰国营燃料和电力集团 Orlen SA 将通过一项价值 11.5 亿兹罗提（约合 2.9 亿美元）的交易，从 EDP Renováveis 购买风能和太阳能项目，从而将其可再生能源发电能力提高近三分之一。【原文：Poland’s state-run fuel and power conglomerate Orlen SA will increase its renewable energy capacity by nearly a third through a 1.15 billion zloty ($290 million) deal to buy wind and solar projects from EDP Renováveis.】

item.title: 香港因反洗钱失职对友邦保险处以创纪录罚款
item.description: 友邦保险集团有限公司因反洗钱疏忽被保险业监管局处以创纪录的 2,300 万港元（290 万美元）罚款。【原文：AIA Group Ltd. was subject to a record fine of HK$23 million ($2.9 million) by the Insurance Authority for anti-money laundering oversight, as the city’s regulators steps up scrutiny of the industry.】

item.title: 意大利引领欧洲电价下降趋势
item.description: 意大利上个月的电价出现上涨，这是自 2022 年以来的首次同比上涨，与整个欧洲的趋势背道而驰。【原文：Italy registered an increase in power prices last month, the first year-on-year gain since 2022 and a departure from the Europewide trend.】

item.title: 挪威调整后失业率创19个月来最高水平
item.description: 挪威上个月调整后的失业率升至2022年以来的最高水平，超过了央行的预期，并提高了明年之前降息的可能性。【原文：Norway’s adjusted unemployment rate rose to the highest level since 2022 last month, exceeding the central bank’s estimate and raising the odds of an interest-rate cut before next year.】

item.title: 据说 GDS 将寻求多达 10 亿美元的资金用于在中国以外地区建设数据中心
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，GDS 控股有限公司正在为其在中国以外运营数据中心的部门寻求多达 10 亿美元的投资，这是在几个月前广受好评的筹资活动基础上进行的。【原文：GDS Holdings Ltd. is seeking as much as $1 billion in investment in its unit that operates its data centers outside of China, people familiar with the matter said, building on a well-received fundraising just a few months ago.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚希望通过债务程序重新安排 49 亿美元贷款
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚计划与财政部长菲特萨姆-阿塞法（Fitsum Assefa）表示，埃塞俄比亚预计其债权人将同意重组 49 亿美元的债务。【原文：Ethiopia expects its creditors will agree to restructure $4.9 billion of debt, Planning and Finance Minister Fitsum Assefa said.】

item.title: 据说 LG 集团的 IT 服务部门正准备在韩国上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，LG 集团的信息技术服务部门正准备最早于 2025 年在首尔进行首次公开募股。【原文：The information technology services arm of LG Group is preparing for an initial public offering in Seoul as early as 2025, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的供应紧缩与德国的痛苦：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）下周发布报告时，可能会跟随其他制药公司上调指导性目标，因为欧洲最有价值的公司正在努力满足对其减肥疗法 Wegovy 的无限需求。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S may follow drugmaker peers in raising guidance when it reports next week, as Europe’s most valuable company races to keep up with insatiable demand for its weight-loss therapy Wegovy.】

item.title: 美国发布就业报告前全球股市下跌，欧洲股市跌幅扩大
item.description: 欧洲股市连续第二天下跌，加入了全球股市因对科技盈利和经济增长的担忧而下挫的行列，交易员们正在等待稍后公布的美国关键就业数据。【原文：European stocks declined for a second day, joining a global selloff amid concerns over tech earnings and economic growth, with traders awaiting key US jobs data later.】

item.title: 美联储减息步伐过于缓慢，恐慌情绪加剧，股市逃离加速
item.description: The flight out of global equities is becoming a stampede as increasing signs of a US economic slowdown spur a pivot toward the haven assets of Treasuries and gold.

item.title: 世界自行车赛负责人欢迎沙特投资，除非沙特资助平行联赛
item.description: 世界自行车运动管理机构负责人表示，欢迎沙特的投资，以帮助稳定公路自行车赛的财政状况，但前提是这些投资不会形成一个平行联赛。【原文：The head of world cycling’s governing body said Saudi investments are welcome to help stabilize finances in the road racing circuit, as long they don’t create a parallel league.】

item.title: 人民币升至 5 月以来最高点，空头套利交易被放弃
item.description: 中国人民币攀升至5月以来的最强水平，因为在地区货币反弹和美国降息前景增强的情况下，交易员放弃了看跌押注。【原文：China’s yuan climbed to its strongest since May as traders walked away from bearish bets amid a rebound in regional currencies and stronger prospects for US interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 意大利《新闻报》称意大利考虑对银行和能源公司征税
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，意大利政府可能会考虑对意大利银行和保险公司以及能源公司征税。【原文：The Italian government may consider a possible levy on Italian banks and insurance companies, as well as energy companies, according to local media reports.】

item.description: 三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.’s profit increased more than analysts estimated last quarter as the Japanese bank joined its local rivals in benefiting from higher lending income after interest rates rose.】

item.title: 瑞士央行考虑下一次降息，瑞士通胀保持稳定
item.description: 瑞士 7 月份的通胀率保持稳定，表明该国央行将进一步放宽政策。【原文：Swiss inflation held steady in July, pointing to further easing by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 强势货币提升外汇资产回报率，GPIF 实现收益
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金在截至 6 月份的三个月内实现了 8.97 万亿日元（600 亿美元）的资产收益，原因是海外货币走强提振了海外证券的表现。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund posted a gain of ¥8.97 trillion ($60 billion) on assets during the three months through June as strength in overseas currencies boosted the performance of foreign securities.】

item.title: 印尼人民银行 10 亿美元贷款降低利率
item.description: 国有印尼人民银行（Bank Rakyat Indonesia）正在推销一笔 10 亿美元的银团贷款，在缺乏交易的市场中为三年期贷款提供了有史以来最低的利率。【原文：State-owned Bank Rakyat Indonesia is marketing a $1 billion syndicated loan, offering its lowest-ever interest margin for the three-year tenor in a market lacking deals.】

item.title: 马云赢得金融科技公司 Mynt 50 亿美元估值后的胜利
item.description: 亿万富翁马云和菲律宾最富有的家族之一双双获胜，因为这家经营菲律宾群岛最受欢迎的电子钱包服务的公司以 50 亿美元的估值筹集了新资金。【原文：Billionaire Jack Ma and one of the richest clans in the Philippines both notched wins as the company running the most popular e-wallet service in the archipelago raised new funds at a $5 billion valuation.】

item.title: 沙特可能增持顶级建筑商股份以支持经济重组
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯政府可能会增持一家陷入困境的建筑企业集团的股份，该集团被视为该国万亿美元经济转型计划的关键。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s government may increase its stake in a struggling construction conglomerate that’s seen as key to the country’s trillion-dollar economic transformation plans.】

item.title: 在欧佩克+产量限制下，俄罗斯石油钻探量从创纪录水平下滑
item.description: 随着欧佩克+（OPEC+）减产协议的深化，俄罗斯石油公司的钻井速度较去年创下的纪录有所下降。【原文：Russia’s oil firms have reduced pace of drilling from last year’s record as the nation deepened its OPEC+ production cuts.】
